description: This file contains functions related to reasoning with Azure AI Foundry models, including model identification and message-based reasoning functions with support for asynchronous operation.

methods.name: is_ai_foundry_reasoning_model
methods.description: Checks if a given reasoning model is an Azure AI Foundry model based on its class name and ID.

methods.name: get_ai_foundry_reasoning
methods.description: Performs reasoning using an agent and a list of messages, extracting content between <think> tags if present, and returning a formatted Message.

methods.name: aget_ai_foundry_reasoning
methods.description: Asynchronous version of get_ai_foundry_reasoning, performing the same reasoning process with support for async agent calls.
